description: Research SEC filings by ticker or CIK to get company details, recent forms, and insider transactions. Extract targeted sections from 10-K, 10-Q, and 8-K to surface the information you need. Streamline due diligence and monitoring with fast, focused access to official disclosures.

capabilities.name: find_company_info
capabilities.description:
[Tool 1: Find Company Info]
            Fetches core company information (CIK, official name, industry classification (SIC))
            using a ticker (e.g., "AAPL") or CIK (e.g., "320193").
            This is often the first step before using other tools.

capabilities.name: search_recent_filings
capabilities.description:
[Tool 2: Search Recent Filings]
            Searches for a list of recent company filings (e.g., "10-K", "8-K", "13F"),
            returning their key metadata: 'accession_no', 'form_type', and 'filing_date'.
            This tool does NOT return the document content.

capabilities.name: extract_text_section
capabilities.description:
[Tool 3: Extract Text Section] (For text-based reports like 10-K, 8-K)
            Parses a filing's original HTML (found via accession_no) to extract the text
            content of a specific 'section_keyword'.
            (Internally uses filing.obj() and .get_section_text())

            Args:
                ticker_or_cik (str): The company ticker (e.g., "AAPL") or CIK.
                accession_no (str): The accession number obtained from 'search_recent_filings'.
                section_keyword (str): (Important) The exact English keyword for the desired section.
                    Valid keywords for 10-K/10-Q include:
                    'business', 'risk_factors', 'management_discussion', 'legal_proceedings'
                    Valid keywords for 8-K include:
                    'item' (to get the main event text, e.g., "Item 1.01")

capabilities.name: get_insider_transactions
capabilities.description:
[Tool 4: Get Insider Transactions]
            Fetches a list of insider transactions (Form 4 filings), showing
            stock purchases or sales by company insiders (e.g., CEO, CFO, Directors)
            within the last 'days_ago' days.
